title: Naviam Maximo Developer Tools Configuration File

config.title: Maximo Environment
config.description: Connection details for a Maximo environment

name.description: Short name to identify the environment

description.description: Longer description of the configured environment

selected.description: Optional attribute that indicates that the environment is currently selected when multiple configurations are available

host.description: The Maximo host name or IP

port.description: The port for the Maximo environment, defaults to 443 if useSSL is true, 80 if false

useSSL.description: Indicates if SSL should be used when connecting ot

context.description: The Maximo application context, defaults to maximo

username.description: The Maximo user name that will be used to connect to Maximo

password.description: The Maximo user password, will be encrypted on save

apiKey.description: A Maximo API key that will be used to authenticate the session instead of a username and password

allowUntrustedCerts.description: Indicates if untrusted SSL certificates are allowed, useful when self-signed certificates are in use

configurationTimeout.description: The amount of time out for a script configuration execution in minutes

timeout.description: The time out connecting to Maximo in seconds

ca.description: The full chain for the certificate authority in PEM format on a single line

maxauthOnly.description: Indicate that only MAXAUTH authentication will be attempted. Useful in some legacy Maximo 7.6 environments

extractLocation.description: Path to the script extract directory

extractLocationScreens.description: Path to the screens extract directory

extractLocationForms.description: Path to the forms extract directory

extractLocationReports.description: Path to the reports extract directory
